name: Voilou - Team 18
description:
VOILOU is a solo arcade beat'em up game in which you play as a school director who must prevent his students from graduating to steal their money. THE GAME

The school director is named Thomas. His goal is to earn the most money possible. 
In order to succeed this goal, he has to hit the students arriving from the screen's right in order to steal their money and to prevent them to move to the next year, which is at the screen's left.

To help him in his mission, teachers can hit students too , if you pay them by throwing money at them. But if the money falls on the ground, students will rush to it !

FEATURES
  • Several types of students : There are students of 5 different years, alterning students and students from school association.
    Each type has a unique particularity which make the game harder.
  • Waves : Students arrive in waves. There are 5 waves that are increasingly difficult.
  • Score Multiplicator : Make the higher score by hitting the students as fast as possible without stopping ! 
  • Throw your money : Grease teacher's palm to make them helping you to hit the students.
  • Full controller & keyboard support : Play with a controller or a mouse with keyboard. As you prefer !
CONTROLS  Keyboard & Mouse  :

- Movements :

- Hit (Left Clic) & Throw money (Right Clic) :

 

Controller  : CREDITS

Game Art : Lilian Clairville / Samuel Mebrek

Game design : Alexandre Berard / Arthur Parmentier / Louan Costa

Game Programming : Benjamin Chariou / Freddy Maupou / Lucas Esposito

Producing : Jean Dambrine / Théodore Genin

DISCLAIMER

This work of fiction was designed, developed, and produced by a multicultural team of various beliefs. Any similarity to persons living or dead is purely coincidential. The views and opinions expressed here do not necessarily reflect those of Team 18 or its employees.

ENJOY THE GAME
